Old, grumpy git. I don't eat Tofu, but am otherwise a fully paid up member of the 'Wokerati' so reviled by our Home Secretary.

I've been a student of Classical Guitar since retiring, and can now read music reasonably. I've played Acoustic Guitar, intermittently, for most of my adult life. I've also taken up the Mandolin in recent years. I'm studying Trad Irish and Bluegrass styles. And. Loving. It!
Just learning about hashtags... #fbpe #wokerati #ClassicalGuitar #Mandolin #MMT

note:
Teaching secondary school (English, mostly) since 1980. American by birth, Canadian by choice. #covid #justice #drums #jazz #dodgers, maybe. Good things: #Bikes, #walking, #gardens, #realfood, #acousticmusic, #art, #reading and #writing. Pieces too long for social media are posted on my blog: http://www.EricMacKnight.com/. No cats, NFL, NBA.

Here’s an idea: Let’s try being kind and respectful to everyone.

A thin floppy-haired boy with wire-rimmed glasses, inspired by the writers of the Star Wars era, catapults his new band of interstellar voyagers on a trek across the stars. Born and raised in the city of big shoulders, I graduate from paintings in art class to fantasy stories of dragon riders and high wizards. The action-packed novels comprising “The Voyan Adventures” are right here.
I stand prepared for the darkest battle with pen in hand, a poetic soldier. Your fantasy architect, sjcw

Writer, psychologist & educator here to learn & share info on politics, psych, education, history &, especially, structural power. Antifascist, anti-oligarchy, atheist. I boost what I find interesting, regardless of whether I agree with it. Resisting fascism includes countering disinformation with facts. I prefer evidence, not evidence-free opinion. Image: Rothko #61
